title: 110_hr6400
content: State Temporary Economic Priority (STEP) Act - Authorizes states to transfer or consolidate funds made available to them under certain federal transportation, education, and job training programs: (1) beginning with the calendar quarter after the United States experiences economic growth at an annual rate of less than 1 for two consecutive calendar quarters. And (2) continuing until 18 months after it experiences economic growth at an annual rate of 1 or more for two consecutive calendar quarters.
